channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: A portable 4K monitor at a low price sounds great, but having tested it, I can say the QQH Z12-4 isn’t perfect
item.description: The QQH 4K Portable Monitor is a cheap and cheerful portable monitor that considers the scenarios in which these devices are most likely to be used.

item.title: Can't think of a good password for every account? It's not your fault - you can also blame the websites themselves, a new study says
item.description: Report finds widespread weak password enforcement across major websites, exposing users and industries to increased automated attacks.

item.title: The ‘Dynamic Duo’ Movie Is Having a Casting Call Next Week
item.description: If you think you can help with the puppet performances for DC's 'Dynamic Duo,' Swaybox wants to see what you've got and bring you on board.

item.title: Is Wall Street losing faith in AI?
item.description: A rough week for tech stocks might signal a loss of investor confidence in artificial intelligence.

item.title: Could the AI bubble be real? This sage of the 2008 market crash and central character of The Big Short, certainly thinks so
item.description: Michael Burry’s large bearish bets on major AI firms revive fears of inflated valuations and deepen debate about a potential bubble.
